spiritsExplanation:
The metadata strongly suggests a 'High-Energy & Intense' workout spirit due to the repeated emphasis on HIIT (High-Intensity Interval Training) throughout the title, description, and tags. Words such as 'intense', 'burn fat', 'maximum health benefits in minimal time', and 'full intensity workout' clearly indicate a high-energy and intense session focusing on quick results and high-effort exercises, which aligns well with a score of 0.95 for this spirit.

The presence of music (NEFFEX and TABATAMANIA) and the structured 30-second activity intervals hint at a 'Flow & Rhythm' spirit as well, with some degree of rhythm and continuity in the workout. However, the main focus remains on intensity, so this spirit is assigned a lower score of 0.4.

Other spirits like 'Structured & Disciplined' or 'Soothing & Restorative' are less applicable due to the lack of methodical progression or focus on relaxation and recovery. The comments further reinforce the intense nature with statements about sweating and fat loss, supporting the chosen spirits.
